channel.title: AfflictionBeta - Hybriding|Pk Economy
channel.description:
[center] [URL=http://imgur.com/mZoFCmt][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mZoFCmt.jpg[/img][/URL]
A Hybriding and PvMing sever with a 100% GUARANTEED Up-time
Website - [url=http://www.affliction-ps.com]Web Hosting - By Arvixe[/url] Download - [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/ccthc8nwqa1abm9/AfflictionBeta.jar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ccthc8nwqa1abm9/AfflictionBeta.jar[/url]
Are you looking for a server with perfect switches? Are you looking for a server with an active deep wilderness? Are you looking for a server with an active PVM community?
Then Affliction-PS is the place for you.
Affliction-PS is a new server which features a active wilderness, hybrid pking, deep wilderness activity and many bosses.
Affliction-ps Features
Clean Combat System Fixed Dragging Clean Switches Dedicated VPS DDos Protected 24/7 Active Pking and PVM community. Active Forums Daily updates Excellent Staff Multiple Daily Server Events including Free For Alls, Hide and Seeks, and More! Spawn any items you need to start pking or kill bosses for unspawnables! Stable economy Custom items Every Chaotic/ Pvp item Pk point system Clean Edgeville home Some bosses are located in the wilderness Affordable donation prices(half off for the first 2 weeks) Nice Unique Pk Economy
Why are we better than the rest?
We care about ALL players Unlike the other servers where the staff only care about their banks, the staff on Affliction-PS cares about helping players The numerous special events that are done every day to enhance our community The intellectual discussions on the forums Because we are a hybriding/pking based server we have worked tirelessly to perfect our combat system
Media:
[URL=http://imgur.com/J1nnr0k][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J1nnr0k.jpg[/img][/URL] [/center]
